title: Computing at scale. Why you should already be using AWS Lambda
description: Title: [Computing at scale. Why you should already be using AWS Lambda] Body: [Node.js is awesome for I/O. But what happens when you need to use CPU bound operations? Or what happens when you don't want to bog down your server with lots of long running tasks? Lambda from AWS gives you just the medicine to solve these headaches and more. Join me for a quick overview and how we solved some real world problems elegantly leveraging the power of Lambda] Additional links: http://aws.amazon.com/documentation/lambda
name: Tanzim
